"Possible reasons for dial failure:
The dialing status is abnormal: Please try to turn off the modem and router, and then power on again after a few minutes. If the problem is not resolved, you can try mac address cloning or adjust the WAN negotiation rate in the router Internet settings, and then dial again.
Broadband is unavailable due to some reasons: Please contact the operator to check for details.
The access broadband has been changed: Please check whether the access bandwidth of the WAN port has been changed."

In WiFi Repeater mode, the info of the connected devices could be inaccurate
Scan the device for security holes

Ports can be divided into virtual ports and physical ports. The ports scanned here are virtual ports, which specifically refer to ports in TCP/IP and UDP/IP protocols. If you compare an IP address to a house, the port is the door to and from the house. Each network has different service functions, and different ports correspond to different services.
2.Why is the port open and what is the purpose of opening the port?
The port has two states: closed and open. An open port means that the system has opened a service on this port, such as the well-known port 23 corresponding to the telnet service.
3. What are the risks of having open ports?
With open ports, a hacker is left with the possibility of hacking into the device. He can log in to the device through a service vulnerability or password cracking.
4. My smart device has open ports, what should I do?

Smart devices have open ports that may serve specific functions; if the password of the open port is weak, the risk will increase, and a hacker can brute force the password through a simple weak password database and log in to your device. It is recommended that you contact the smart device manufacturer to inquire whether it is necessary to open the port. If there is no special requirement, it is recommended to close it. Generally, the smart device needs to update the firmware to close the open port. Because Mi/Redmi router IOT device security scan is strictly in accordance with the protocol standard to determine whether the port is open, if there is a smart device that does not fully follow the protocol standard, there may be misjudgments. There are cases where the actual smart device does not have an open port, but according to the protocol scan, it returns with an open port.
5. My smart device prompts an exception during a security scan
Security scanning essentially polls well-known ports and interacts with smart devices. If any smart device prompts an exception, do not worry.

"The router admin password is mostly the same as the WiFi password. It is recommended that you try to log in with the WiFi password
If you forget the password, you can restore the router to factory settings and reset it: in the power-on state, press the reset button with a needle and hold it for 3 seconds. After the indicator light flashes, release it, you can restore the factory settings and follow the instructions to set up the router."
(Located on the back of the router)

Restoring the factory default settings means that you will lose the original configuration data, and the login password will also initialize the unencrypted state, so please do not operate the reset button at will

"2.1 The system status light is steady blue, then the router system is running normally, please skip to step 3 to continue troubleshooting. 2.2 The system status indicator is steady orange, indicating that the router is rebooting. Please wait patiently for 5 minutes, do not unplug the router. 2.3 Flashing orange indicates that the router is being updated. Please wait patiently for 5 minutes, do not unplug the router. 2.4 The system status light is orange. If the blue light cannot be restored after more than 10 minutes, you can try to flash. 2.5 Flashing red/steady light means the router is abnormal. 2.6 If it still doesn't work, you can try to reset the router after unplugging it for 3 minutes, reset method: long press reset button for 5s."

"Since you are not on the router's network, you have very limited info. We recommend that you follow these steps to troubleshoot:"
1. Make sure the power plug is inserted firmly and the power cord is not loose.
2. Please confirm that there is electricity in the home and the power strip is powered on.
If the indicator is not lit, it is recommended:
1. The solid orange light indicates that the router is rebooting. Please wait patiently for 5 minutes, do not unplug the router
2. The orange flashing indicates that the router is being updated. Please wait patiently for 5 minutes, do not unplug the router.
3. If the blue light cannot be restored after more than 5 minutes, you can

"If that doesn't work, please contact Xiaomi customer service"
1. Please confirm whether the network cable is tightly inserted or damaged.
2. Please check whether the modem is faulty, or try rebooting the modem
3. Please reboot the router and wait for the startup to complete, and then try to connect after the blue light is on.

4. Please confirm whether the first three segments of the IP address of your mobile phone are 192.168.31. If not, please modify your IP settings to auto or DHCP. (View and modify the location: Phone Settings-Wireless LAN/WLAN-Current WiFi Details Page-Configure IP/IP Settings)
5. If you still cannot access the Internet, please contact Xiaomi Customer Service

WiFi 6 is a new generation of WiFi technology which supports OFDMA, BSS color, TWT, and more. However, after enabling this feature, some old devices may have compatibility issues such as unable to find or connect to the router. Please find out more on the manufacturer website:
* The device must support the 802.11ax protocol to experience the high-speed connection brought by WiFi 6.

As shown in the figure above, please connect the external network cable to the network port at the bottom of the mesh router (close to the power supply), and always use this network port as the external network port.

Because the Internet access mode is manually selected, please do not replace the external network port of the Mesh router during subsequent use. Always select the lowest network port (close to the power supply) and connect to external devices such as optical cats, broadband cats, and home network cables .

"The location of this Mesh device cannot provide you with the best network experience. Try the following methods to optimize: 1. Shorten the distance between Mesh devices, preferably not more than 2 rooms. After adjusting the position and rebooting, click \"Retry\" 2. Don't put it on tall obstructions, such as near large appliances, place the Mesh device on a flat and open location and click \"Retry\" after rebooting If no optimization is needed, just click continue"

"1. If your bandwidth is greater than 100M, please make sure that your optical cat and router are both Gigabit Ethernet. The speed will be limited during 100Mbit speed measurement.
2. Please pause or shut down the device that is using traffic during the speed measurement. The current device will occupy the bandwidth, resulting in inaccurate speed measurement results.
3. Please make sure that the current router is used as the main route. The WiFi Repeater mode will affect the speed measurement result.
4. Please make sure the network is in direct connection mode, and no network proxy such as VPN is used to connect.
5. The speed measurement result may be inconsistent with the actual bandwidth due to environmental impact. The actual bandwidth is subject to the operator's provision."

"1. If your bandwidth is greater than 100M, please make sure that your optical cat and router are both Gigabit Ethernet. The speed will be limited during 100Mbit speed measurement.
2. Please use 5G WiFi for speed measurement.
3. Please keep close to the router when measuring the speed. Too long distance or obstruction in the middle will affect the speed measurement result.
4. Please pause or shut down the device that is using traffic during speed measurement. The current device will take up bandwidth, resulting in inaccurate speed measurement results.
5. Please make sure that the current router is used as the main route. The WiFi Repeater mode will affect the speed measurement result.
6. Please make sure the network is in direct connection mode, and no network proxy such as VPN is used to connect.
7. The speed measurement result may be inconsistent with the actual bandwidth due to environmental impact. The actual bandwidth is subject to the operator's offer."

After the authorization is revoked, all routers under your current Mi account will be unpaired and the data stored on the server by the router will be cleared. Dear Mi/Redmi router user:
Hello!
Due to business adjustments, the restart plan function will be discontinued one after another at 24:00 on February 18, 2019. At that time, the plug-in entrance of this function will be closed first, and the firmware module will be gradually removed with subsequent releases. It is recommended that you delete the restart task you have set as soon as possible. If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact Xiaomi customer service 400-100-5678. Thank you for your support and understanding. We apologize for any inconvenience!

WiFi dual frequency combination is off, 5G will use the same network name (plus suffix _5G) and password as 2.4G. You can change this later in settings.

After enable, 2.4G and 5G will use the same name (by default 2.4G related configuration), the router will automatically select the best WiFi frequency for each device. After this, some devices may be offline and need to reconnect.
WPA3 is a new encryption technology with greater enhance the security, but old devices will have compatibility issue.

When turned on, the anti-hacking firewall will protect your WiFi network in real time. When an illegal intrusion is found, the anti-hacking firewall will immediately black out the equipment used by the illegal intruder and notify you immediately, so that you can always grasp the security situation of your home network and protect your property and privacy.
Avoid unknown sources and APKs which may contain viruses

When enable, your device will be protected automatically. When a virus/Trojan is found in the downloaded installation package, the security application firewall will block it immediately to protect your mobile phone, prevent mobile phone failures and personal privacy leaks caused by viruses/Trojans, and protect your property and privacy.
Detecting router disk files for viruses
Contains Trojan virus, it is recommended to delete
Real-time reminder for unfamiliar devices, block with one click

After being turned on, the Flood Protection firewall will supervise the strange devices connected to the network in real time for you. When a strange device enters the network, it will proactively send out a notification reminder. If a high-risk device is connected, you can actively block the device from connecting to the network according to the security level or prompt you to blacken it with one click. You can also set your own protection security level, add a blacklist of network-connected devices, and view interception records, which can effectively prevent others from going online and ensure your network security and Internet experience.
Router successfully resolved info leakage risk
Prevent the domain name resolution of routers from being hijacked to phishing websites and Trojan horse websites
Automatically block malicious process networking to prevent leakage of privacy and property info

"When turned on, the Anti-leak firewall will protect your device and automatically block malicious processes from networking. When a malicious process with a virus/Trojan is found to be connected, the info leakage firewall will block it as soon as possible to protect your phone's security, avoid mobile phone failures and personal privacy leaks caused by viruses/Trojans, and protect your property and privacy."

Automatically block malicious access, background vulnerabilities and cyber attacks

When turned on, the smart home firewall will protect your smart home device and automatically block malicious access, background vulnerabilities and network attacks. When an illegal visitor tries to access the camera or smart device in your home or uploads or downloads data abnormally, the smart home firewall will block the abnormal access and block the transmission of abnormal data as soon as possible to avoid the info leakage of the camera and smart home Cause privacy leaks and protect your privacy.
There is a security risk, it is recommended to fix it now
Set the safety protection switch, please go to the safety center
Automatically detect whether files downloaded by each device are at risk for viruses

"After it is turned on, the file download firewall will protect your device, and automatically detect and block each file for viruses/trojans. When a virus/Trojan is found in the downloaded file, the file download firewall will block the malicious file as soon as possible to protect your mobile phone's security, avoid mobile phone failure and personal privacy leakage caused by virus/Trojan, and protect your property and privacy."
Automatically detect whether the website visited by each device is at risk of virus/trojan

"When turned on, the malicious URL firewall will protect your device and automatically detect and block the websites visited by each device for viruses/trojans. When accessing a malicious URL with a virus/trojan, the malicious URL firewall will block the malicious URL as soon as possible to protect your mobile phone's security, avoid mobile phone failure and personal privacy leakage caused by the virus/trojan, and protect your property and privacy."

"User Experience Improvement Program Â Â
Xiaomi Communication Technology Co., Ltd. (\"Xiaomi\") invites you to take part in our User Experience Program (\"the Program\"). If you participate, data and usage statistics for Mi Router app will be sent to Xiaomi so that we can better understand how this product is being used.
We don't collect any personally identifiable information or user data (contacts, call history, etc.) as a part of the Program. We collect statistics about how (and how often) you use Mi Router's various features.
1. Opting in or out You can opt in or out of the Program anytime in Settings.
2. Purpose of this Program We aggregate your data and usage statistics into anonymous statistics to help us learn more about how Mi Router is being used and improve overall stability and quality. More specifically, we use this info to: 1). Push new updates and repairing bugs as quickly as possible. 2). Optimize router performance for different types of connections (e.g. ADSL, Optical fiber). 3). Make sure Mi Router is compatible with as many different types of devices as possible 4). Improve connectivity and features for Mi devices. 5). Provide anonymous data usage statistics for plug-in developers for Mi Router.
3. Updates to the Program We're always changing and improving our products, we may also make changes to the Program. If we do, we'll notify you via a notification in the Mi Router app.
Xiaomi Communication Technology Co., Ltd. October 2014 "
Help Xiaomi improve this product by sending us data and usage statistics. [View details]
